name: generator-jhipster-stripe-payment
description: This module integrate the payment plateform STRIPE to a Jhipster project. (It includes a web payment page and a JHipster payment entity)

author.name: Contribution Jhipster UGA, Julien Courtial, Hugo Gros-Daillon, CÃ©dric Lafrasse, Bastien Terrier (https://github.com/contribution-jhipster-uga)

scripts.release: git push && git push --tags && npm publish
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major -a -m "Update to %s" && npm run release
